item.title: LV-Data v3.10.0.9
item.description:
Product: LV-Data v3.10.0.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Sat, 03 May 2025 22:14:56 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: - Collection of VIs to write and read files in TDMS, Igor Text (*.itx), and text-based spreadsheet data (*.dat) formats.
- LV graph to Igor Pro and Igor Pro formatters
- Tools are provided for uploading to and downloading from AWS S3

Release Notes: [3.10.0]]
- remove tests from package and update package dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Razorbill RP100 v2.1.0.9
item.description:
Product: Razorbill RP100 v2.1.0.9
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Fri, 02 May 2025 17:53:55 -0400

Description: Drivers for Razorbill RP100 HV amplifier

Release Notes: [2.1.0]
- #15: Change to Instrument Framework 1.15
- #16: update UI to show SMO state
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.9.0.17
item.description:
Product: PPMS Monitor and Control v1.9.0.17
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 02 May 2025 17:53:54 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Monitor and Control application inheritng from Instrument Framework and SMO
- Log instrument status to the PGSQL database.
- UI and API for controlling magnet field, temperature, and rotator angle (PPMS2 only)

Release Notes: [1.9.0]
- #20: new API format (ie, setMagnet instead of Set Magnet)
- #22: Instrument Framework v1.14(.4)
- #23: Update to QDInsrtumetn.dll v1.0.7 enables OptiCool
- #24: Change PPMS3 persistent/driven magnet
- #26: Select temperature approach mode (Channel 0: FastSettle, 0: No Overshoot)
- #30: Change to Instrument Framework 1.15 / SMO 1.4
- Change startup behavior to use QDInstruments local mode if address is empty, 127.0.0.1, or localhost
- Add PPMS.lvlib containing class factory to decouple classes and reduce circular dependencies
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.1.9
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v2.20.1.9
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 02 May 2025 17:53:53 -0400
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [2.20.1]
Issues:
- #96: change to Instrument Framework 1.15 / SMO 1.4

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab
